discrepancies.details: Line item 'Ibuprofen BP 200mg': Invoice unit price £88.00 vs PO price £80.00 (10.0% increase)

processing_results.agent_reasoning: Successfully extracted invoice data using Gemini Vision. Found 3 line items. Critical fields: 4/4, Optional: 8/8. PO ref present: True. Found exact PO reference match: 'PO-2024-004' exists in database. Matched PO: PO-2024-004. Supplier match: True (100% similarity). Line items matched: 3/3. Detected 2 discrepancies. Price variance detected: 10.0% on 'Ibuprofen BP 200mg'. Total variance: £300.00 (2.3%). Invoice GPS-8842 processed with 96% extraction confidence. Document quality assessed as 'excellent'. Matched to PO-2024-004 via exact po reference (98% confidence). Detected 2 discrepancies:   - Price Mismatch: Line item 'Ibuprofen BP 200mg': Invoice unit price £88.00 vs PO price £80.00 (10.0% increase)   - Total Variance: Invoice total £13476.00 vs PO total £13176.00 (variance: £300.00, 2.3%) Risk factors: 1 high-severity discrepancies, 1 medium-severity discrepancies. RECOMMENDATION: ESCALATE_TO_HUMAN. Significant issues detected. Immediate human attention required before processing. Human Reviewer: Data extraction quality is high. However, the core reconciliation failed due to a critical price variance on item GPS-A101 (Ibuprofen BP 200mg). The invoice unit price of £88.00 is 10% higher than the PO price of £80.00. This variance must be resolved with the procurement team or the supplier (via a confirmed price change or a credit note) before payment can be processed. The current recommendation to escalate is appropriate and mandatory.
